itunes:title: Episode 175 - Father's Day
title: Episode 175 - Father's Day
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: With Jarred and Rocco's father having been on the show, Ross interviews his father for this special edition of Drinkin' Bros. If you haven't sat down to talk to your father about his life or what he's been through, we highly suggest you do.  You never kn...
itunes:summary:
With Jarred and Rocco's father having been on the show, Ross interviews his father for this special edition of Drinkin' Bros. If you haven't sat down to talk to your father about his life or what he's been through, we highly suggest you do.  You never know how long they are going to be on this earth and you won't regret it. Happy Father's Day to all the Dads out there.  We love you.

description:
With Jarred and Rocco's father having been on the show, Ross interviews his father for this special edition of Drinkin' Bros. If you haven't sat down to talk to your father about his life or what he's been through, we highly suggest you do.  You never know how long they are going to be on this earth and you won't regret it. Happy Father's Day to all the Dads out there.  We love you.
